transactionListColumns.quote.title: Transaction list columns Quote
transactionListColumns.quote.description: Use these fields to assign custom column headings for My Account > Purchases > Quotes.

id.title: ID
id.description: Enter the Field ID of the field you want to render. Valid values: trandate, duedate, and total_formatted.

label.title: Label
label.description: Enter the title you want to use for this column.

transactionListColumns.enableQuote.title: Enable Quote columns management
transactionListColumns.enableQuote.description: Check this box to enable Quotes Columns Management.
